headline: Tracking Mario Gabelli's Gabelli Funds 13F Portfolio - Q3 2024 Update
summary: Gabelli Funds' 13F portfolio value grows to $13.87B, with top holdings in Microsoft and Lennar. Click here to read more about the trades and holdings in Q3.
